<start_of_turn>user

The King's Indian (d2d4 g8f6 c2c4 g7g6) hypermodern, allows center control. This opening emphasizes rapid development.<end_of_turn>

When should I consider a pawn breakthrough?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Consider pawn breakthroughs when you have a pawn majority, the opponent's king is vulnerable, or you can create passed pawns. Calculate carefully to avoid weakening your own position.<end_of_turn>
